attributes.action: It is the will of the people that Boris Johnson appears in leadership debates.
attributes.additional_details: With woefully sketchy past performances in public office, the people have the right to present and deliberate on whether Johnson is ‘fit and able’ to lead the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: In the race to be Prime Minister of our great county, it is right and proper that Boris Johnson be mandated to face the electorate in a televised debate in his contest with Jeremy Hunt. The will of the people demands it. Avoidance is not a leader’s strategy.

rejection.details: This would be a personal decision for Boris Johnson, and not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
